response.answer_text: A disc jockey, often abbreviated as DJ, is a person who plays existing recorded music for a live audience. Most common types of DJs include radio DJ, club DJ who performs at a nightclub or music festival and turntablist who uses record players, usually turntables, to manipulate sounds on phonograph records.

Coming directly to the point so that you get a short and on the point answer. DJ or Disc Jockey is a word that refers to someone who plays some specific parts of songs which he/she pre organizes or live organizes into a playlist to create a party like environment.
